functions.name: addVoter
functions.function: To add a voter to the voter's list. Can be executed by owner only.
inputHelp: Address of entity to add as voter

functions.name: start
functions.function: To open the TruCode for votes. Can be executed by owner only.
inputHelp: Time in seconds to open polling for

functions.name: vote
functions.function: To cast a vote. Only voters already added can vote. Requires voting to have started

functions.name: getVotes
functions.function: To get the number of votes casted
